title: Metro Ecstasy
description: It starts out with a mentally unstable woman gets molested on the train. She gets away but left her bag with all her money and train pass in it behind. So she's playing a game on a bench after she escapes where one of the metro worker finds her but she sees him as the main character in her game that she loves. He begins to take her back to the office telling her he can get her some help but she pisses herself and he tries to rape her right there saying he was going to have a gangbang back in the office but he couldn't wait. Then a bunch of other retarded things happen with train molesters blackmailing the train employees so they can have free rain to molest anytime anywhere on the train
